sentences.en: A wreck on shore is a beacon at sea.
are any of the crew left on shore?.
sentences.cn: 有没有船员还留在岸上？。

sentences.en: Bill pushed us off and we went skimming away from the shore.
sentences.cn: 比尔把我们的船撑开,我们就滑离了海岸.

sentences.en: Danny listened to the waves breaking against the shore.
sentences.cn: 丹尼聆听着波浪拍岸的声音。

sentences.en: He had jumped overboard in New York harbor and swum to shore.
sentences.cn: 他在纽约港跳下船，游上了岸。

sentences.en: He landed his troops on the western shore.
He rowed as quickly as he could to the shore.
sentences.cn: 他尽快地把船划到岸边。

sentences.en: Huge waves were breaking on the shore.
In the storm, many seamen wished they were on shore.
sentences.cn: 在暴风雨中, 许多海员想,要是他们在陆地上就好了.

sentences.en: It was a mile by water, four miles round the shore.
sentences.cn: 由水路去只有一英里, 沿岸绕行要四英里.

sentences.en: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.en: She began to swim to shore.
The sea washed against the shore.
The ship pulled in to the shore at midnight.
The ship's cinema was empty because everyone was on shore.
sentences.cn: 船上电影院空无一人,因为大家都上岸去了.

sentences.en: The trees on the shore line were reflected in the clear water.
sentences.cn: 沿岸的树木在清清的河水里倒映出来.

sentences.en: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore.
sentences.cn: 煦暖的气候将比目鱼引到了近海。

sentences.en: We could see a boat about a mile from shore.
sentences.cn: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.en: We could see a glimmer of light on the far shore.
sentences.cn: 我们可以看到对岸微微闪烁的灯光。

words.tran_cn: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住

phrases.tran_cn: 马里兰大学东海岸分校

trans.tran_en: the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake
to prop or make safe with or as if with a shore
to prop or make safe with or as if with a shore
